title: Sri Ranga Ranganathanin Song Lyrics Mahanadhi
stanzas: <div>Sri Ranga Ranganathanin Song Lyrics Mahanadhi

Ganga sankaasha kaaveri
sri rangesha manohari
kalyaanakaari kalusaari
namasthetu sudhachari

Sri ranga ranganaathanin
paadham vandhanam seiyyadi
Sridevi ranga naayagi naamam
sangatham solladi

inbam pongum then
gangai neeradi
manjal kungumam
manjal neer soodi

inbam pongum then
gangai neeradi
thendral pola nee adadi

manjal kungumam
manjal neer soodi
dheva paasuram paadadi

Sri ranga ranga naathanin
paadham vandhanam seiyyadi
Sridevi ranga naayagi naamam
sangatham solladi

Kollidam neer meedhu
narthanam aadum
melliya poongaatru
mandhiram paadum

sengani melaadum
maamaram yaavum
ranganin per solli
saamaram veesum

annaalil Chola mannargal
aakki vaithanar aalayam
ammaadi enna solluven
koyil gopuram aayiram

thaenaaga nenjai allume
dheiva poonthamizh paayiram

Sri ranga ranga naathanin
paadham vandhanam seiyyadi
Sridevi ranga naayagi naamam
sangatham solladi
inbam pongum then
gangai neeradi
thendral pola nee adadi

manjal kungumam
manjal neer soodi
dheva paasuram paadadi

Sri ranga ranga naathanin
paadham vandhanam seiyyadi
Sridevi ranga naayagi naamam
sangatham solladi

Kalladam thai veedu
endriundhaalum
kanni un maruveedu
thennagam aagum

gangaiyil melana
kaviri theertham
mangala neeraada
mun vinai theerkkum

neer vannam engume vida
nanjai punjaigal paaradi
oor vannam enna kooruven
dheiva logame thaanadi

verenga sendra podhilum
indha inbangal yedhadi

Sri ranga ranga naathanin
paadham vandhanam seiyyadi
Sridevi ranga naayagi naamam
sangatham solladi

inbam pongum then
gangai neeradi
thendral pola nee adadi

manjal kungumam
manjal neer soodi
dheva paasuram paadadi

Sri ranga ranga naathanin
paadham vandhanam seiyyadi
Sridevi ranga naayagi naamam
sangatham solladi
